import { useState } from "react" import { byRole } from "./Bridge" export const Short=()=>{ const[cred,setCred]=useState({ "person":"", "role1":"", "role2":"", "expected":0.0 }) const track=(eve)=>{ const{name,value}=eve.target setCred((old)=>{ return{ ...old, [name]:value } }) } const sub=async()=>{ alert(JSON.stringify(cred)) const t = await byRole(cred.role1,cred.role2) } const res=()=>{ setCred(()=>{ return{ "person":"", "role1":"", "role2":"", "expected":0.0 } }) } return(<>

Shortlist Resource's

) }
